data.name: XMultiTextMarkup
desc: provides functionality to apply multiple text markups in one call.

methods.name: commitMultiTextMarkup
desc: The main use of this function will probably be for proofreading to allow for setting the markup of all found errors in a sentence in a single call. For this the sequence needs to provide the markups for all errors along with the markup for the identified sentence boundaries. The order of those entries is arbitrary.
